entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
